column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
はぁ… はぁ…
落ち着くのよ私…
column4:
*pant...pant*
Just...let me catch my breath...

column3:
どうしましょ困ったわ…
いくら魔物が好きな私でも この状況は…
column4:
I may love monsters, but this is a bit
much even for me. Maybe I'll get lucky
and lightning will strike them.

column3:
あぶなく命を落とす所でしたわ！
まだ結婚前ですのに…
column4:
To think, I nearly died before getting
married. That's not a proper order of
operations!

column3:
もしかして私
魔物に好かれちゃったんですかね…
column4:
These monsters would attack a lady
before she's wed? How so very...
monstrous!

column3: ヒィー！ガーディアン！"逃げなきゃ！
column4:
Sweet Bokoblin! It's a Guardian!
I'm out of here!

column3:
私に何か用でしょうか？

私はただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
この地域のどこかにいる大妖精様に会うと
幸せになれるというお話ですけど…
本当かしら？
column4:
Oh, you mistook me for a Gerudo? No
worries, for some reason it happens all
the time. No idea why!
Maybe because I'm traveling in search of
true love. I'm single and ready to mingle,
but my love of monsters scares people...
But I heard there's a Great Fairy in this
region. They say if you find her, you'll be
blessed with happiness. I hope it's true!

column3:
この地域のどこかにいる「大妖精様」に会うと
幸せになれるというお話…本当かしら？
column4:
I heard there's a Great Fairy in this
region. They say if you find her, you'll be
blessed with happiness. I hope it's true!

column3:
私に何か用でしょうか？

私はただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
スタルヒノックスは大きくて不気味で
自分の骨を投げてくるところが素敵です！
魔物の好きな男性と一晩中
スタルヒノックスのお話をしたいです
column4:
Oh, you mistook me for a Gerudo? No
worries, for some reason it happens all
the time. No idea why!
Maybe because I'm traveling in search of
true love. I'm single and ready to mingle,
but my love of monsters scares people...
Stalnoxes are pretty big and creepy, but
the way they throw their own bones at
you...is just so cool!
Maybe I'll find someone who likes
monsters as much as I do. Then we can
stay up all night talking about Stalnoxes!

column3:
スタルヒノックスは大きくて不気味で
自分の骨を投げてくるところが素敵です！
魔物の好きな男性と一晩中
スタルヒノックスのお話をしたいです
column4:
Stalnoxes are pretty big and creepy, but
the way they throw their own bones at
you...is just so cool!
Maybe I'll find someone who likes
monsters as much as I do. Then we can
stay up all night talking about Stalnoxes!

column3:
え？私に何か？

私はただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
北に向かえばヒガッカレ馬宿ですけど
その道中には とても強い魔物がいるそうです
なんだか ゾクゾクします！
column4:
Oh, you mistook me for a Gerudo? No
worries, for some reason it happens all
the time. No idea why!
Maybe because I'm traveling in search of
true love. I'm single and ready to mingle,
but my love of monsters scares people...
If you go north from here, you'll find the
East Akkala Stables. I heard there are
some strong monsters along the way.
Just thinking about such strong monsters
gives me goosebumps!

column3:
北に向かえばヒガッカレ馬宿ですけど
その道中に屈強な魔物がいるそうですよ
column4:
If you go north from here, you'll find the
East Akkala Stables. I heard there are
some strong monsters along the way.
Just thinking about such strong monsters
gives me goosebumps!

column3:
私ですか？人違いじゃなくて？

私はただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
そういえば この地方のどこかに
とても大きな魔物がいるという話を聞きました
どこかに とても大きな魔物…
大雑把すぎる この情報がすべてなんです
見つけるの大変そうですよね！
column4:
Oh, you mistook me for a Gerudo? No
worries, for some reason it happens all
the time. No idea why!
Maybe because I'm traveling in search of
true love. I'm single, ready to mingle, but
my love of monsters scares people away.
I heard there's a really big monster
somewhere in this region.
Like...REALLY big.
Sadly, that's all the info I've got on it.
It's not enough to track it down, but I
would love to see such a big monster.

column3:
この地方のどこかに
とても大きな魔物がいるという話を聞きました
column4:
I heard there's a really big monster
somewhere in this region.
Like...REALLY big.
Sadly, that's all the info I've got on it.
It's not enough to track it down, but I
would love to see such a big monster.

column3:
はい何でしょうか？
私 行商をしているわけではなくて…
ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
イチカラ村で結婚式が行われるそうですよ
列席者の中に素敵なボーイ…いますように
column4:
Oh, were you hoping to buy something
from me? Normally people mistake me for
a Gerudo, but never for a merchant!
I hear there's a wedding in Tarrey Town.
Weddings are great for meeting people,
so I'm hoping to meet someone myself.

column3:
イチカラ村で結婚式が行われるそうですよ
列席者の中に素敵なボーイ…いますように
column4:
I hear there's a wedding in Tarrey Town.
Weddings are great for meeting people,
so I'm hoping to meet someone myself.

column3: 朝は好き…
column4: I just love the morning.

column3: デートしたいな…
column4: I need to find a date.

column3: 運命の人…
column4: Where to meet someone...

column3: 夜は魔物が…
column4: Monsters prowl in the dark.

column3: ひどい天気・・・
column4: What lousy weather!

column3:
私の楽しみは とても平凡で
未来の旦那様を想像して ワクワクすることと…
魔物の姿を想像して ゾクゾクすることです
column4:
What do I do for fun? The normal things.
I list my favorite things about monsters...
I imagine where the monsters live...

column3:
雨は嫌いでもないかな…
何か突然の出会いがありそうで
column4:
I don't hate the rain. People tend to
gather indoors when it's pouring out,
so you never know who you'll meet.

column3:
雨宿りって嫌いじゃないんですよね
なぜかっていうと…
飛び込んできた素敵な人が
自然に声かけてくれることがあるから！
column4:
I don't mind taking shelter from the rain.
It raises my chances of meeting my
special someone in a romantic setting!

column3:
あっ びっくりした…
何でしょうか？
私 ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
ご存知ですか オクタロック…
タコのくせに水に落ちると溺れ死ぬんです
水オクタだけは さすがに溺れませんけどね
column4:
Oh! You startled me. Were you hoping to
buy something from me? Sorry, but I'm
not a merchant.
I'm out here traveling in search of true
love. I'm single and ready to mingle, but
my love of monsters scares people away.
Speaking of... Did you know Octoroks
can drown even though they're octopi?
Only Water Octoroks survive the plunge!

column3:
ご存知ですか オクタロック…
タコのくせに水に落ちると溺れ死ぬんです
水オクタだけは さすがに溺れませんけどね
column4:
Did you know Octoroks can drown even
though they're octopi?
Only Water Octoroks survive the plunge!

column3:
はい？私ですか？

私 ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
ここも魔物がけっこういて魅力的な土地ですが
ハイラル城の魅力には かないませんね
城に眠ってるといわれる宝物より
城で目覚めている魔物を想像してしまいます
そして私 ゾクゾクしちゃいます！
column4:
You're talking to me? I'm just a plain ol'
Hylian traveler is all, nothing quite as
interesting as a Gerudo or a monster.
I'm out here traveling in search of true
love. I'm single and ready to mingle, but
my love of monsters scares people away.
Seeing Hyrule Castle can make for a
nice view if you can get it, but all the
monsters around make it even nicer.
I hear there's a lot of treasure left in the
castle, but I get more excited thinking of
all the monsters that must be in there!

column3:
ハイラル城に眠るといわれる宝物より
城で目覚めている魔物を想像するのが好きで…
思わず私 ゾクゾクしちゃいます！
column4:
I hear there's a lot of treasure left in the
castle, but I get more excited thinking of
all the monsters that must be in there!

column3:
あのですね…
声かけてくれるのは うれしいんですけど
私何のとりえもない ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
ここからヒガッカレ馬宿に行く間に
かなり大きな魔物が出るって聞いただけで…
震えが止まりません！

もちろん楽しみすぎてです！
column4:
Oh, hello! I'm a bit surprised you decided
to talk to me. My love of monsters often
scares people away. No idea why!
I heard there's a great big monster along
the way to East Akkala Stable, and I've
been shaking ever since.
Shaking with excitement, that is!

column3:
ここからヒガッカレ馬宿に行く間に
かなり大きな魔物が出るって聞いただけで…
楽しみ過ぎて震えが止まりません！
column4:
Even just hearing about a giant monster
along the way to East Akkala Stable... It
got me so excited—I'm still shaking!

column3:
えっと…何でしょうか？

私何のとりえもない ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
いま私大妖精様のウワサが気になっていて…

一目見れば幸せになれるって聞きましたし
それに服を豪華にしてくれるそうです！
column4:
You're talking to me? I'm just a plain ol'
Hylian traveler is all, nothing quite as
interesting as a Gerudo or a monster.
I'm out here traveling in search of true
love. I'm single and ready to mingle, but
my love of monsters scares people away.
Right now, I'm interested in rumors
about the Great Fairy. They say just a
single glance will bring you happiness...
And that she can make your clothes
more luxurious!

column3:
いま私大妖精様のウワサが気になっていて…

一目見れば幸せになれるって聞きましたし
それに服を豪華にしてくれるそうです！
column4:
Right now, I'm interested in rumors
about the Great Fairy. They say just a
single glance will bring you happiness...
And that she can make your clothes
more luxurious!

column3:
なんで私なんかに声を？

私 ただの旅人ですよ…
恋人募集中で魔物好きの ただの旅人です！
楽しみも平凡で魔物をいろいろ想像することや
自分の未来の旦那様を想像すること…
そういえばイチカラ村の結婚式も楽しみ！
列席者の中に きっと素敵な人がいそうですし！
column4:
You're talking to me? I'm just a plain ol'
Hylian traveler is all, nothing quite as
interesting as a Gerudo or a monster.
I'm out here traveling in search of true
love. I'm single and ready to mingle, but
my love of monsters scares people away.
What do I do for fun? The normal things.
I list my favorite things about monsters...
I imagine where the monsters live...
I'm looking forward to the wedding at
Tarrey Town. I'm bound to meet someone
who likes monsters as much as me there!

column3:
ところでイチカラ村の結婚式って
いつ頃なんでしょうね？
出会いのチャンスがありそうで
今から楽しみなんですけど…
column4:
Speaking of, do you know when the
wedding at Tarrey Town starts? I can't
be late to meeting my perfect someone!

column3: 助かりましたわ！
column4: Oh, I'm saved!

column3: あなたがいなければ どうなってたか…
column4:
I don't even want to think about what
would've happened if you hadn't come
along to help.

column3:
本当に助かりましたわ！
これはこれで旅の出会いですね！
column4:
You saved my life! I'm glad we were able
to meet like this.
Is this our destined encounter?

column3:
本当にありがとうございました！
あなたがいてくれて幸運でしたわ！
column4:
Oh, thank you! I'm lucky you were here
to save me.

column3: 今日で旅が終わってしまうところでした…
column4:
And to think, I was just one day from
this journey being over.

column3:
魔物を間近で見られて興奮しましたけど…
でもよかった助けていただけて…
column4:
Traveling would be so much easier if it
weren't for all these monsters. But at
least you were here to help.

column3: 私の感謝の気持ち お受け取りください！
column4:
Please, take this.
As a thank-you!
